topic: Using AI Ethically as a Student: Policies, Credits, and Learning Well
target_audience: students and instructors navigating AI in coursework

refs.content: Guidance for transparent, responsible AI use; emphasizes acknowledgement, allowed use, and outcome alignment.
Regulatory advice on AI in higher education; promotes authentic tasks and clear policy communication.
AI tools cannot be authors; require transparency and accountability for generated content and data use.

special_instructions: Provide model policy statements for syllabi, examples of permissible use, and how to cite AI assistance credibly.
